extendedInfo.description: Montreal Metro & Bus shows you the schedules of the bus and metro lines in Montreal. The schedules and routes are kindly provided by the STM through their Open Data initiative.Your location is used to show you all nearby stations (swipe to go to the next station) or you can simply search for a station, a bus/metro line, or a bus station number.Add a station as a favourite and always find it quickly and conveniently.A map view showing the stations and connecting lines is available in the station details.This app was created in collaboration with RFx Software Inc.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Open the app and you are set to go. Just what I need as a public transport user. Devs are responsive. Paied for premium to get even more. Worth every cent. Keep up the excellent service!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow to acquire location
reviews.comment: Better than the STM app.  Finds your location and shows closest bus & metro Very innovative because it seeks your GPS location and gives a list of the closest buses and metro. It also shows times for BOTH directions on the same screen, saving time. Good visual presentation and design. Beats the official STM app for ease of use and quick info.  UPDATE: Annoying inability to connect and get GPS info, even when outside. Has slowed in its ability to acquire position.  Freezes at \"wait for location\". Uninstallin
reviews.author: Can Agbaba

reviews.title: Best way to travel Montreal
reviews.comment: Best app especially if your a tourist or someone who is new to Montreal
reviews.author: Christopher R

reviews.title: Easy to Use very Intuitive
reviews.comment: Wow! Great App for Montreal Bus and Metro. I\'m using it daily to see if the app is accurate. Working very well and the GPS search NearBy functionality is impressive.  I also like the \'Add to Favorites\' which I can store all my nearby bus\' and metro departures.  Good work Guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice UI.
reviews.comment: Is there a way to see entire bus schedules for the day instead of just the next departures?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Lastest update really fixed the bugs. Great local ap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only usable while online
reviews.comment: As a tourist I was hoping this app would have a map of the metro system that didn\'t require data usage on the phone. If you are an international tourist it\'s only worth using if you have an unlocked phone and get a prepaid sim card.
reviews.author: John Niebuhr

reviews.title: Clean and we\'ll thought out.
reviews.comment: Great start! However I did notice that there are two menu buttons. One in the app the other is in the action buttons below the hot bar on the Galaxy Nexus. Would also be nice to swipe to switch between the screens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Very nice app but need a offline schedules for premium
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent!
reviews.comment: very nice. does not yet contain all features of the ios version but it\'s definitely a nice first release!  thanks a lot!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Let\'s you easily see the next departure times of busses nearby.
reviews.author: A Google User
